Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin April 21, 2005 Integration of Craigslist & Google Maps Moz News The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Craigslist's directory of real estate for rent and sale has long been the very best the Internet has to offer for those searching for housing in metropolitan areas. Now, Paul Rademacher has combined Craigslist's RSS feeds with Google's Maps system to produce one of the more incredible, functional tools on the web.Stop by SEOChat for conversation on the subject - this was originally pointed out by member Toddieg, whose been on a roll as of late, presenting some terrific stuff in the forums. Copied! Back to Top
